prompt_tiers.tier1: The user sent a test message.

response_tiers.tier1: Hello!  It looks like your test worked.

response_tiers.tier3: The test message was received and processed successfully.  All systems are operational.  I am ready to assist you with any tasks or questions you may have.  Please let me know how I can help.
